nodes.bodyText: As discussed. {@link #getReturnType(XExpression, false)} would be my preference.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ * Returns the actually inferred return type for the given expression or null if none. * Returns the actual expression type, if no explicit return type exists. * - * Shorthand for {{@link #getReturnType(XExpression, false)}} + * Shorthand for getReturnType(XExpression, false)

nodes.bodyText:
Which should have read
{@link #getReturnType(XExpression, boolean) getReturnType(expression, false)}
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -70,7 +70,7 @@ * Returns the actually inferred return type for the given expression or null if none. * Returns the actual expression type, if no explicit return type exists. * - * Shorthand for {{@link #getReturnType(XExpression, false)}} + * Shorthand for getReturnType(XExpression, false)
